hint.text: Obtain co-ordinates of all the node points.

solution.text:
Point b=(2,61), Point d=(4,47)
Therefore, the movie earned 61 crores and 47 crores in the second and fourth weeks respectively
Difference in earnings = 61-47
=14 crores

content.text: Compute the difference between the earnings of week 2 and week 4?
